meaningMnemonic: Put your <radical>fingers</radical> in somebody's <radical>business</radical> by <kanji>slap</kanji>ping them! This method also works if someone is getting too involved in your business. Slaps are basically your way of doing business with your fingers.
readingMnemonic: ぼく is one way to say "I" in Japanese, usually used by dudes. But you're going to use it now when you <kanji>slap</kanji> this guy. Who's in everybody's business, slapping them? <reading>ぼく</reading>.
